title: Site Porte JR
description: This website fits itself as institutional and has been developed for Porte junior enterprise. Such a company operates in the architect and engineering business. The website in addition to containing info about the company it also counts with a blog that shares information and curiosity that surround the world of construction, energy, and environment. Added to that, our team, always thinking about product value, we also include a live chat (Jivo) for better attending the website visitants.

title: Hipátia Mobile App
description: The Hipátia app has a very interesting idea, give to the women, and just them, a place to share to the app audience the services they offer. Then, by social media and other personal data placed on the annoucement, the community can get in touch and hire the service. It is worth mentioning that was the first project I had contact with Javascript stack (ReactJS, React Native, Node, etc) and fastly turned itself my favorite stack. We used in the development: React Native, ExpressJS(NodeJS`s framework), and NoSQL database MongoDB, which also are below. The project still in development

title: Checkout and Dashboard AVEC
description: This is the Checkout and Dashboard for AVEC, which is a company that operates in the beauty business, both on cosmetics sales and digital platform sales. The Checkout e Dashboard cited, was done to attend the commercialization of the digital products, such as internal system, mobile app, card machine, among others. They have, respectively, 5 steps, going from choosing the plan to payment and a dashboard, that makes it possible to see the current plan, past payments, future invoices, payment way change, and a store with other products. In the Front-end we use ReactJS and in the Back-end we use SYDLE ONE to treat the business rules and provide the Front-end data with APIs.

techs.name: Sydle one
techs.description: SYDLE ONE is a low-code and BaaS (Backend as a Service) platform, internally use Java and Angular. That platform offer the possibility of script injection with RHINO. Through this, are made the most specific business rules that the platform does not cover and the APIs and endpoints are made too.
